const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-explicit-mappings-books",
  mappings: {
    dynamic: false,
    properties: {
      name: {
        type: "text",
      },
      author: {
        type: "text",
      },
      release_date: {
        type: "date",
        format: "yyyy-MM-dd",
      },
      page_count: {
        type: "integer",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
